title: More than just a Photo Booth
subtitle: An elegant experience built on quality, convenience, and style.

gallery.title: Photo Gallery/Portfolio
gallery.description: See the magic for yourself! Browse our curated gallery of past events, from wedding to corporate parties. Every photo is high-quality, professionally edited, and showcases the fun our booths bring.

sharing.title: Instant Photo sharing
sharing.description: Let your guests take their memories home immediately! With our instant system, photos can be sent via QR code, email, or text—perfect for posting straight to social media.

printing.title: Custom Print & Frame Options
printing.description: Your event, your style. Choose from a variety of print sizes, layouts, and frames, all personalized with your event logo, colors, or theme. It is more than a photo—it is a keepsake.
